tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Shot rounds of 74-76-74-75 at the first Qualifying Tournament to earn his PGA TOUR China Series conditional exemption after finishing T34…Was T62 in the first event—the Mission Hills Haikou Open, improving 13 strokes from his third-round 80 to his final-round 67…Was T32 at the Buick Open, with first- and final-round 71s…Was T51 at the United Investment Real Estate Wuhan Open…Made his fifth consecutive cut to begin the season, and four par-or-better rounds at the Earls Beijing Open led to his first top-10—a T3 at Earls Beijing GC. Opened with rounds of 65-68 and trailed 36-hole leader Xin Jun Zhang by a stroke. Recovered from a third-round, even-par 72 with a 68 on the final day to finish T3 with Lucas Lee…In his next start, was T41 at the Yulongwan Yunnan Open…Returned to the top 20 in mid-September in Beijing when he T17 at the Cadillac Championship. Shot a final-round 69 after a third-round, 2-under 70 at Qinghe Bay GC.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T3rd in 2014 at the Beijing Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T85th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the PGA Tour China Series.
